alert.note: Alert for Ravalli (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 07 at 8:33PM MDT until further notice by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Montana, including the following county, Ravalli. * WHEN...Until 1130 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 833 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in Spooner Creek and Acres Road. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Flooding near the Spooner Creek and Acres Road. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 1.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - https://www.weather.gov/mso/hydrology
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
